item.description:
We will hike to the summit of N. Uncanoonuc following a snowmobile trail. The hike will be about 2.6 miles round trip with a vertical elevation gain of 600 feet which is not as steep as the White Dot Trail (eliminating 100 feet of vertical gain while being 0.2 miles longer). We will be starting off of Mountain Road.   There are some views at the summit.

There is parking for about 7 cars at the trail head, We might have to do a little car pooling from a near by parking spot depending on how many people sign up.  The bigger parking lot is only a little over 0.1 miles from the smaller one which makes for an easy car pool if needed.

From the Mountain Road trail head we will take the Class 6 Road Trail to the Blue Trail up to the summit of North Uncanoonuc.

 

Here is a link to the trails around S. and N. Uncanoonuc Mtns.

http://www.nhmountainhiking.com/hike/uncanoonuc/posted_ma...
item.how_to_find_us: From the center of Goffstown on S. Mast Road at the Gulf Express/Dunkin Donuts sign turn onto Mountain Road. The trail head is 2.0 miles up Mountain Rd. (0.6 miles past 227 Mountain Rd.). The parking lot is on the left side of the road.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Hike to Summit of North Uncanoonuc,Goffstown - Line Hike
